description: Area on the main board holding objective tile stacks and the face-up display.

components.description: Location for the face-down Silver Objective tile deck.
Location for the face-down Golden Objective tile deck.
Two slots displaying face-up Silver Objective tiles available to take.
Two slots displaying face-up Golden Objective tiles available to take.

_comment: This area itself is not a worker placement location. Gaining objectives happens via other actions (e.g., track bonuses, campsite actions).
